column4: Does anyone know why the eject button on my DVD ROM doesn't work in Ubuntu with a disc in when the one on my CD burner does?

It works in BIOS, Windows, and Ubuntu (without a disc in), so I'm a little hesitant to blame the hardware.  I also posted in the forums, and several other people said they had the same problem with DVD ROM's.
do they all talk about the same brand and or model?
That didn't come up.  Maybe I should post and see if I can get responses to that.
The drive is Toshiba, I believe...
